Package game.behaviour

Class FlyingBreedBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.behaviour.BreedBehaviour
game.behaviour.FlyingBreedBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class FlyingBreedBehaviour
extends BreedBehaviour
Class that decides whether a flying type actor is ready to breed and find a breed partner within a certain radius
Since:
20/05/2021
Author:
Lin Chen Xiang
See Also:
BreedBehaviour, GoToLocation, BreedAction, Location, Dinosaur, DinosaurStatus, Gender

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Goes through each radius to check for suitable breeding partner, then do action if found
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      Action to be done this turn (MoveActorAction, BreedAction)
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • hasPartner

      Action hasPartner​(Location there, Dinosaur dinosaur, Gender targetGender, GameMap map)
      Checks whether this Location has a suitable partner and its surroundings allows actor to breed with this partner
      Specified by:
      hasPartner in class BreedBehaviour
      Parameters:
      there - Location of this tile
      dinosaur - the Dinosaur finding a partner
      targetGender - the gender of the target which should be opposite of dinosaur
      map - World map
      Returns:
      null if no partner or no tall growable around partner, or action to move towards a location beside found partner
